ai_explanation.introduction_english: Let's dive into the word we will be focusing on today, "いっしょう," which is frequently used in conversations involving the entirety of one's life and commitments.
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word "いっしょう" means a lifetime or one's entire life. It covers the entire span of a person's life from birth to death and is often used when talking about the duration of life or lifelong commitments.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

of one's life.MY: ဘဝတစ်လျှောက်လုံး

examples.kanji: 私は一生懸命勉強します。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は一生懸命(いっしょうけんめい)勉強(べんきょう)します。

translations.BN: আমি খুব মনোযোগ দিয়ে পড়াশোনা করি।
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် မျှော်လင့်ချက်ဖြင့် လေ့လာပါမည်။
translations.HI: मैं बहुत मेहनत से पढ़ाई करता हूँ।

examples.kanji: 彼は庭師として一生を終えました。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は庭師(にわし)として一生(いっしょう)を終(お)えました。

translations.EN: He spent his entire life as a gardener.
translations.ID: Dia menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai tukang kebun.
translations.ES: Él pasó toda su vida trabajando como jardinero.
translations.VI: Anh ấy đã dành cả cuộc đời mình làm người làm vườn.
translations.FR: Il a passé toute sa vie comme jardinier.
translations.BN: তিনি তার সারাজীবন একজন মালি হিসাবে কাটিয়েছেন।
translations.ZH: 他以园丁的身份度过了一生。
translations.TL: Ginugol niya ang buong buhay bilang isang hardinero.
translations.MY: သူသည် ယာတွေထူတဲ့သူ အဖြစ် သူ့ဘဝတစ်ခုလုံးကို ဖြတ်သန်းခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: उन्होंने अपने पूरे जीवन को एक माली के रूप में बिताया।
translations.FA: او تمام زندگی‌اش را به عنوان باغبان گذراند.

examples.kanji: 彼らは一生を共にします。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)らは一生(いっしょう)を共(とも)にします。

translations.EN: They spend their whole lives together.
translations.ID: Mereka menghabiskan seluruh hidup mereka bersama.
translations.ES: Ellos pasan toda su vida juntos.
translations.VI: Họ dành cả cuộc đời bên nhau.
translations.FR: Ils passent toute leur vie ensemble.
translations.NE: उनीहरूले आफ्नो सारा जीवन सँगै बिताउँछन्।
translations.BN: তারা তাদের পুরো জীবন একসাথে কাটায়।
translations.TL: Magkasama nila ang kanilang buong buhay.
translations.MY: သူတို့နှစ်ဦးဟာ ဘဝတစ်ခုလုံး အတူတူ ပြန်လည် ဖြတ်သန်းကြပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वे अपना पूरा जीवन एक साथ बिताते हैं।
translations.FA: آنها تمام عمرشان را با هم می گذرانند.

examples.kanji: 彼は私の一生の友です。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は私(わたし)の一生(いっしょう)の友(とも)です。

translations.ID: Dia adalah teman seumur hidup saya.
translations.ES: Él es mi amigo de toda la vida.
translations.VI: Anh ấy là người bạn cả đời của tôi.
translations.FR: Il est mon ami de toute une vie.
translations.NE: उ उहाँ मेरो जीवनभरको साथी हुनुहुन्छ।
translations.TL: Siya ang aking panghabambuhay na kaibigan.
translations.MY: သူက ငါ့ရဲ့ဘဝတစ်လျှောက်လုံးမိတ်ဆွေဖြစ်တယ်။
translations.HI: वह मेरे जीवन भर के मित्र हैं।
translations.FA: او دوست تمام عمر من است.

synonyms: 生涯 : しょうがい : life
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "いっしょう" is "しょうがい". Both terms refer to the concept of a lifetime; however, "しょうがい" often implies the duration of one's life and includes factors that may affect that period.
antonyms: 一瞬 : いっしゅん : instant
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "いっしょう" is "いっしゅん". While "いっしょう" refers to a long period covering a person's life, "いっしゅん" denotes a very brief moment or an instant.

parts_of_speech: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Adverb (fukushi)
Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

collocations: いっしょうをともにする
